caption:
Table 1
KeyNMF's performance on Chinese news data against a number of baselines. Topic descriptions were
evaluated on diversity (d), internal (Cin) and external (Cex) word embedding coherence.
description: Table 1 presents KeyNMF's performance against other topic modeling baselines, evaluated across multiple metrics on various Chinese news datasets.
